definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: But the visitors could not comprehend the St Kildans they gawped at.
sentences.chinese: 但是，游客们盯着圣基尔达人却并不能理解他们。

sentences.english: whether the twitterati are more annoying or just more flighty than everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 也不知道是否社交网络达人会比较惹人厌或更轻浮。

sentences.english: "China's Got Talent" will retain the three-person jury panel of the original British version and will not change its members during the run.
sentences.chinese: 中国达人的评委也是三个，和英国达人的设置一样。

sentences.english: "China's Got Talent" will retain the three-person jury panel of the original British version and will not change its members during the run.
sentences.chinese: 中国达人的评委也是三个，和英国达人的设置一样。

sentences.english: What do you think about the TV show, "Britain's Got Talent"?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得《英国达人秀》这个电视节目怎么样？

sentences.english: If you love two perso , select the second;
sentences.chinese: 假如你爱城市达人上了两个人，选择第二个。

sentences.english: Finally, for everyone to see a screen, China expert show of migrant workers dance.
sentences.chinese: 最后，给大家看一段视屏，中国达人秀的民工舞蹈。

sentences.english: The fashionista was wearing a Dolce & Gabbana spider web dress.
sentences.chinese: 这位时尚达人穿了一件杜嘉班纳的蜘蛛网图案连衣裙。

sentences.english: All the fashionable women are doing it.
sentences.chinese: 所有的时尚达人都这么做。

sentences.english: Selfish heart, sign the barrier that the person reaches a person.
sentences.chinese: 自私自利之心，是立人达人之障。

sentences.english: Maybe a kind typophile might illuminate us in the comments
sentences.chinese: 也许一个热心的印刷达人在评论里告诉我们的。

sentences.english: Of course, some fashion lovers beg to differ.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有些时尚达人并不同意。

definition: what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
(slang) novice/greenhorn/fool/idiot/abbr. for 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3], pretty boy
